item.title: Welcome to my blog!
item.description: Welcome to my blog! Welcome to my blog, I’m Arthur De Witte, and I’m a student at HOWEST (University College West Flanders) in Brugges, Belgium. I’m currently studying for a bachelor in Computer Science, and I’m in my 2’nd year. I love learning and experimenting with new technologies. What can you expect here? I will be posting about my projects, my studies and other things I find interesting. As of writing this I’m mainly interested in the Rust programming language.
item.content:
Welcome to my blog!

Welcome to my blog, I’m Arthur De Witte, and I’m a student at HOWEST (University College West Flanders) in Brugges, Belgium. I’m currently studying for a bachelor in Computer Science, and I’m in my 2’nd year. I love learning and experimenting with new technologies.

What can you expect here?

I will be posting about my projects, my studies and other things I find interesting. As of writing this I’m mainly interested in the Rust programming language. I’m also proficient in Python, TypeScript and Java.

Besides from language specific posts, I’m greatly interested in building performant future-proof architectures.

Is this blog open source?

Yes it is, it has been build with Hugo, and uses the Terminal Theme from Panr. The source code can be found on GitHub.
